abstract: Wells Fargo is paying $24 million to end an investigation by eight states into whether lenders acquired by the bank made risky mortgages to consumers without disclosing their perils.
snippet: Wells Fargo is paying $24 million to end an investigation by eight states into whether lenders acquired by the bank made risky mortgages to consumers without disclosing their perils.
lead_paragraph: Wells Fargo is paying $24 million to end an investigation by eight states into whether lenders acquired by the bank gave risky mortgages to consumers without disclosing their perils, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Payment to End Wells Fargo Inquiry

abstract: Eola Property Trust is seeking to raise as much as $675 million in an initial public offering, the company said Wednesday.
snippet: Eola Property Trust is seeking to raise as much as $675 million in an initial public offering, the company said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Eola Property Trust is seeking to raise as much as $675 million in an initial public offering, the company said Wednesday.

headline.main: Eola Property Trust Plans $675 Million I.P.O.
